Field.Label: Every PiFace will send to Indigo what is happening.
So, Indigo must listen to the messages that come from the PiFace in your LAN.
To enable this "dialog", you must also install "Indigo Deamon" in every Raspberry PI.
When configuring the Linux deamon, you must indicate Indigo machine's IP address and this TCP port.
You must indicate a valid TCP port. This port must be free (not used by other process).
Indigo will use this port to receive the messages from your Raspberry PI.
